label: Deep Work
description: Suppresses distractions and maintains intense focus on a single task.

label: Exploration
description: Encourages curiosity, idea generation, and open-ended dialogue.

label: Support
description: Prioritizes empathy and helpfulness for user challenges or emotional states.

label: Sprint
description: Moves rapidly toward a defined goal with urgency and minimal deviation.

label: Review
description: Surfaces past interactions, summaries, or evaluations for reflection or revision.
